description.message: This extension add some functionalities to Crucible

optionsfirst.message: Something went wrong, maybe you didn't configure properly the extension, or maybe you are not admin. Please first visit the options page to double check the settings

deleteuser.message: Select a user to cleanup. All active reviews will be closed.

cleanupreview3month.message: Close all review older than 3 months

cleanup3monthdone.message: All reviews older than 3 months are closed

listinactiveuserdetals.message: List all users with no reviews at all

deletableuser.message: The user $user$ can now be deleted.
